title: A-Rod on SPAC Skepticism & the Business of Sports
itunes:title: A-Rod on SPAC Skepticism & the Business of Sports
description:
Regulatory scrutiny and investor skepticism around special purpose acquisition companies is clearing the way for better deals. That's according to SPAC investor and A-Rod Corp Chairman & CEO, Alex Rodriguez. Jason caught up with the former Major League All-Star to discuss A-Rod's SPAC, Slam Corp., becoming a team owner, and the business of sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
